label: 野宮
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A second place of purification erecter for her [i.e. the Ise Virgin's] use at an auspicious site near the capital, which during the Heian period was always in the Sagano area west of the city (p. 386). [嵯峨野]
